bug.title: [JSF2.0] org.eclipse.wst.html.core.internal.document.ElementStyleImpl cannot be cast to org.w3c.dom.Attr
bug.description:
Steps: Can't re-create the bug. See the following exception in the log when building the JSF 2.0 based Smoke test application
eclipse.buildId=I20101028-1441 java.version=1.6.0_18 java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc. BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US Command-line arguments: -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -data D:\Eclipse\ws\helios-scratch1
Error Fri Nov 05 10:30:57 PDT 2010 A structured model client, org.eclipse.wst.html.core.internal.htmlcss.HTMLDocumentAdapter@f2037 threw following exception during adapter notification (CHANGE )
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.wst.html.core.internal.document.ElementStyleImpl cannot be cast to org.w3c.dom.Attr at
